message:
Dear Team,

This is to notify you that {{ doc.employee_name }} has successfully submitted the Exit Questionnaire Form as part of their separation process.

You may review the submitted responses and take any necessary follow-up actions. Please refer to the {{ doc.doctype }} record for full details.

You can access the record directly using the link below:

Thank you for your continued support in ensuring a smooth exit process.

Best regards,
HR Team,
{{ doc.company }}
name: Exit Questionnaire Form Submission
subject: Exit Questionnaire Submitted by {{ doc.employee_name }}
